title: Dead Space Remake Looks Even More Gruesome! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.01.21
description:
Go to http://purple.com/games10 and use promo code games10 to get 10% off any order of $200 or more!

Blessing and Andy talk about the Dead Space remake, Final Fantasy VXI & Xbox at Tokyo Games Show, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
TOMORROW, Surgeon Simulator 2 is FINALLY here, and SnowBikeMike is going to play it on launch day. The catch? Kevin is going to use IRL robotic arms to mess with Mike while Tim and Joey hang out! Thursday at 11AM PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames the VOD will then go up on youtube.com/kindafunnyplays
ALSO TOMORROW, you’re getting a new episode of The Blessing Show all about EA Sports Big. That’s going live at 7am PT with a YouTube premiere on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan
The Roper Report   -
00:09:55 -  The new Dead Space was shown off yesterday!
00:22:50 - Tokyo Games Show COULD have Final Fantasy XVI - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:25:30 - Speaking of Tokyo Games Show, expect Xbox news as well - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:32:30 -  Ad
00:33:39 - Brendan 'PlayerUnknown' Greene Leaves PUBG Corp & Creates New Independent Studio - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:42:32 -  Life Is Strange TV Series Still In the Works With Shawn Mendes Now Overseeing the Music - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:49:20 -  Xbox’s Tomb Raider timed exclusivity deal was reportedly ‘worth $100m’ - Andy Robinson @ Video Games Chronicle
00:56:15 - Out today
00:58:00 - Squad Up:Alex Suarez(Playstation/Life) - OMGLifeReally
01:03:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Janet & Tim

games 10 promo code games 10 terms apply story number four brendan player unknown green leaves pubg corp and creates a new independent studio that's from matt kim at ign brendan green aka player unknown in the creator a player known as battlegrounds has announced the formation of a new independent game studio in amsterdam netherlands green was originally a modder whose experiments with the battle royale genre eventually led to the creation of playerunknown's battlegrounds he was later hired by bluehole to continue developing the game under the newly formed pubg studios following the success of pub g bluehole renamed itself crafton and in 2019 uh green announced that he was stepping away from pubg to work on experimental projects with a small team in amsterdam however green is now leaving the company altogether to form his own independence studio though crafton will hold a minority stake in green's new company quote i'm still very grateful to everyone at pubg and crafton for taking a

the company altogether to form his own independence studio though crafton will hold a minority stake in green's new company quote i'm still very grateful to everyone at pubg and crafton for taking a chance on me and for the opportunities they afforded me over the past four years green says in a statement quote today i'm excited to take the next step on my journey to create the kind of experience i've envisaged for years and a quote green's new studio hasn't revealed its name or what it's working on but in 2019 green said he's done with with the battle royale genre meanwhile crafton is continuing the development of pubg and a sequel set in the near future called pubg new state other crafting studios include striking distance studios which is working on the horror game the callisto protocol from dead space creator glenn schofield as well as a pub g animated series from producer adi shankar i just learned about that adi shankar uh produced thing today and adi shankar apparently just
